episodes.title: Unpacking MAGA with an Expert: Is It a Cult or Strategy?
episodes.description:
Join @Yewleea on Burning Questions as she dives into the heated debate: Is the MAGA movement a cult? Featuring cult expert Rick Allen Ross, founder of the Cult Education Institute, this episode explores the characteristics of destructive cults—charismatic leaders, thought reform, and exploitation—and examines if modern politics, including Trump’s MAGA and historical regimes like Nazi Germany or North Korea, fit the mold. A must-watch for insights on cults, politics, polarization, and disinformation in 2025 America.

----------------------------
Please keep discussions on this channel clean and respectful and refrain from using racist or sexist slurs and personal insults.
